Details.Name: Rewards
Details.Feature: S$1.60 = 5 Membership Rewards points at Starbucks, Jasons Market Place, Kinokuniya, Amazon & EpiCentre
S$1.60 = 2 Membership Rewards points on everything else
Enrol in Non-Frequent Traveller Rewards Programme (S$10) to redeem dining & shopping rewards
OR Enrol in Frequent Traveller Rewards Programme (S$40) to redeem dining & shopping rewards, flights and hotel stays

Details.Name: Shopping
Details.Feature: Purchase Protection included - offers repair, replacement or reimbursement to purchased goods damaged or stolen within 90 days

Details.Name: Air Miles
Details.Feature: Exclusive Savings with Zuji - 12% savings at participating hotels and 2% savings on all flight bookings
Up to S$200,000 accidental death and dismemberment insurance while travelling on a public conveyance
